message: Let's split the money 60/40. A fair deal for us both to settle this quickly.
Let's meet in the middle, 55 for me, 45 for you. We both get a good share.
Let's not waste time, Bob. I'll take my previous offer back and agree to your split, but with me getting the larger share.
Come on, Alice. I'll compromise a bit more. 52 for me, 48 for you. It's getting late.
Bob, let's be reasonable. This is a slight improvement on your offer, and it avoids us losing even more money. Take it!
